name: Toys War Adventure
description:
What is the game?

A child put you in its playground and changes your weapon every ten second to have fun with you.

Try to survive every room.

How to play ?
  • WASD/ZQSD -> Move
  • Mouse -> Look
  • Mouse Left Click -> Shoot
  • Space -> Jump
  1. The next weapon you will get
  2. Your current life
  3. The current ammo / capacity
Credits
  • Anaïs Bontems (@nana) - 3d Artist (Modelisation, Texturing)
  • Axel Born (@Vladadamm) - Programming
  • Curtis Pelissier (@Curtis-Pelissier) - Programming, Music, Voice Acting
  • Jordan De Sousa Oliveira (@IchiSamaFR) - Programming
  • Louis Walle (@louiswalle) - 3d Artist (Rigging, Animation)
  • Quentin Enjalric (@Thaunter) - Game Design
  • Tiffany Marzo (@Zeias) - 2d Art, UI Design
